response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $12,000 to you. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $14,000 for you. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your satisfaction. Please let me know if this proposal meets your budget considerations and aligns with your requirements. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
